channel.title: Need Fly Command
channel.description: I need the code to the ::god command, like the server coding. So you can fly around.. anyone got?

item.title: Need Fly Command
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:



        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("fly")) {
            setAnimation(1500);
            playerSE = 1501;
            playerSEW = 1851;
            playerSER = 1851;
            playerSEA = 1851; 
            sendMessage("fly mode on");
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
        } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("flyoff") && playerRights >= 2) {
            sendMessage("fly mode off");
            setAnimation(760);
            playerSE = 0x328;
            playerSEW = 0x333;
            playerSER = 0x338;
            playerSEA = 0x326;
            playerEnergy = 100;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
        }

please edit to your liking!!!

Read full topic
